ContinuousDataStream
ContinuousDataStream

Contains the logic for the "Continuous Data Stream" command.

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_CONTINUOUS_DATA_STREAM  - The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE

0x85  - The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions
getDeviceSelector

MipTypes::DataClass type
)

Converts an MipTypes::DataClass to the device selector for this command.

Parameters

MipTypes::DataClass

The MipTypes::DataClass to get the device selector for.

Returns

The device selector for the given MipTypes::DataClass.

)

Builds the bytes for the "set" command.

Parameters
type
MipTypes::DataClass

The MipTypes::DataClass to set the state for.

bool

Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) continuous data streaming.

match_data
virtual bool match_data(
const MipDataField &field
) override

Attempts to match an MipDataField to the expected data field response.

Returns

true if the field matches the expected data, false if it does not.

parseResponse
bool parseResponse(
const GenericMipCmdResponse &response
) const

Parses a successfully matched response for the ContinuousDataStream command.

Parameters
response
const GenericMipCmdResponse&

The GenericMipCmdResponse that matches the data field for this response.

Returns
